title: ZLZ Men's Skinny Slim Fit Stretch Comfy Fashion Denim Jeans Pants
description: Comfortable Wear, This slim fit jeans are comfortable to wear throughout the day. Its unique sweat-absorbent and breathable fabric feels soft, even after being washed many times.
Excellent Stretchy, This comfy stretch skinny jeans made of excellent elastic fabric that holds it shape throughout the day. Allows you have no restriction to move and feels comfortable.
Easy-to-Match, This slim fit style with slightly tapered jeans can be worn casual with flats or boots and a relaxed tee, creating a chic and stylish result.
Well-Made, Each pair of our men's stretch jeans uses triple stiches, sturdy buttons and zippers.
Mens slim jeans fabric content: 70%cotton 28%polyester 2% spandex, Machine washable.
